attributes.action: Stop sending money and weapons to Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
Escalation and direct involvement of the UK in the Ukraine-Russia war is both unnecessary and dangerous for our national security.
The government should stop sending £3 billion per year to Ukraine and use it here to help pensioners and farmers instead.
attributes.background: The government should de-escalate the conflict in Ukraine. In particular, it should halt permission to fire Storm Shadow missiles at Russia.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Stop sending military aid to Ukraine 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702525
